TITLE.P: Software for financial analysis and accounts

SHORT_DESCR.P: Enebakk municipality shall procure a digital tool that is user friendly for analysis, financial planning/unit management, reports and analysis. The municipality would like a web based tool that gives general process support through all the activities in the municipality´s annual cycle for finance and management. The main activities in the municipality´s annual cycle are the analysis of different management parameters, the financial plan, annual budget and reports (monthly, 4-monthly and yearly). The aim of the procurement is to make the processes more efficient (automation), ease our resources situation, have easier access to management information, increase the degree of involvement, generally improve goal achievement and increased digitalisation. The system shall be adapted to municipal needs for general management and follow-up of all the activities in the municipality´s financial annual cycle.

General tool for management by objectives, budgeting, unit planning and reports. In addition, the system must be able to provide thorough analysis possibilities, which give a good starting point for efficient reviews and strategic priorities.
— Tenderers must have very good expertise on municipal management and follow-up,

— The system shall be adapted to municipal needs for general management and follow-up of all the activities in the municipality´s financial annual cycle. There will not, therefore, be a need to have systems tailor-made for Enebakk municipality,
— The system must be built up so that it is possible to implement it quickly with the municipality´s finance system Visma Enterprise.

INFO_ADD.P: Justification for awarding a contract without a prior competition: After a search in the market, Enebakk municipality believes that there are no other products that have an equivalent general system as Framsikt. Several municipalities have been a pilot and have developed the system.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: The tool for the financial plan shall digitalise the entire work process with this. It shall, amongst other things, include functions for management by objectives, consequence adjustments, follow-up of political decisions, population development, use of fiscal rules, distribution of limits, work with initiatives, payroll budgeting and priorities and an overview of framework development. It must have separate functionality for following-up investment projects and further support for reports on projects. It must be possible to publish the content in the finance plan on the internet and have dynamic functionality so that the reader can easily click to an area of interest. The system shall also have an over of financing needs and calculate future loan requirements. It must be possible to archive all budget versions in the system, so that it is easy to go back and see the history. The unit managers (persons responsible for the budget) must be able to work in the system, for reporting initiatives/cuts and cost calculations for their unit. This shall include functionality for calculating payroll expenses. The system for the annual budget must include a budget form, detailed budget, payroll budget and budget adjustments. This tool must be integrated with the finance plan.

The tool for reports must show the financial status for all levels of the municipality. It must be possible to to produce graphs for analysing the figures with just a few clicks. The system must be set up so that the unit managers can report in the system, both on figures so far this year and prognoses. It must be possible to make digital reports in the same way as the finance plan.

INFO_ADD.P: Justification for awarding a contract without a prior competition: After a search in the market, Enebakk municipality believes that there are no other products that have an equivalent general system. Several municipalities have been a pilot and have developed the system. The system allows, amongst other things, the use of KOSTRA-figures and other public data as a basis for budgeting, management by objectives and other purposes. In addition, there is, amongst other things, a presentation layer that makes it easy to publish the plan for inhabitants, politicians and other parties.
